alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 9:49AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...THIS MESSAGE IS FOR TEST PURPOSES ONLY... TEST. TEST. TEST. The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a TEST message for the 2023 Ohio Statewide Tornado Drill. This includes all counties in Northwest Ohio and is valid until 1000 AM EDT. THIS IS A TEST MESSAGE. This is a TEST. Repeat...this is a TEST message for the 2023 Ohio Statewide Tornado Drill. There is no severe weather occurring at this time. This TEST message is part of the annual Ohio Tornado Drill. If this were an actual severe weather event, you would be given information about the hazard. The National Weather Service, Ohio Emergency Management Agency and the Ohio Committee on Severe Weather Awareness encourages the use of this time to either activate or review your severe weather safety plans. Repeating...this has been a TEST message for the 2023 Ohio Statewide Tornado Drill. This concludes the TEST. This is a TEST message. Repeat...this is TEST message.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams
